website_summaries.verdict: A good alternative for those who find Alpha GPC choline supplements a little overwhelming. Excellent quality from an outstanding manufacturer.
pros: Gradually, but effectively increases choline levels with reduced risk of side effects
Enhances cognitive function and boosts memory
May increase dopamine receptor density for improved motivation and mental endurance
cons: Some find it takes up to a week to start noticing effects

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have CFS/ME and have spent thousands on supplements and treatments. I will try anything that may help. Every person is different but this was the first supplement that increased my energy and my cognition. HIGHLY recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cinelli

customer_reviews.title: don't go crazy by reading all the online positive reviews
customer_reviews.text: Listen, not all body type is same. maybe I'm the unlucky one but after ingesting 3 bottles of this stuff, my tinnitus got really bad and exacerbated hyperacusis. be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Began taking as I research Alzheimer's
customer_reviews.text: As I begin to research what we can do as individuals to prevent the onset of Alzheimer's (as it runs in my family), I have come across the idea that choline is an important factor in neurotransmission. While my research is not yet complete, taking choline supplements seemed like a 'no brainer' (ha!). I take CDP choline (along with alpha GPC choline, uridine and DHA as in fish oil). Since I've started, I can report anecdotally that my sleep has been better. My dreams are more vivid and memorable.
customer_reviews.author: JustAGuy

customer_reviews.title: I think it helps!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this in conjunction with rhodiola by double woods while getting off adderall. I've been off adderall for about 3 weeks now and I can honestly say I don't miss it too much. These have made the transition much easier and shorter. I only felt less than ideal for about a week and then my cognitive functions along with physical energy had returned. I would suggest this to anyone. Even those not getting off stimulants or other psychoactive drugs. I would say give it at least 3 or 4 weeks before you pass judgement, as it can take a while for nootropics to fully kick in.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I take Double Wood's CDP Choline as part of a stack of supplements to help alleviate ADHD symptoms. I have found that taking this along with the other supplements does also help to mildly enhance cognitive performance and memory, and also lifts "brain fog." In addition, I feel like I am able to focus for longer periods of time when working on projects. When taken as part of my stack, I have been able to reduce the dosage of my prescription ADHD drugs without any ill effects.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Hashimoto find.  Helps with mood.
customer_reviews.text: Helps with mood. Essential for Hashimoto and anyone who has addictions issues I found this while trying to help a friend and reading an article about addiction ... a disease I really am blessed to not have.
customer_reviews.author: Laceykthoughts

customer_reviews.title: CDP Choline is one of the best supplements I've taken
customer_reviews.text: CDP Choline is one of the best supplements I've taken, and now I take it daily. Not only does it help with mental energy, but since I've started taking it, my migraine headaches have decreased in frequency and severity. It's worth looking into if you're a migraineur.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Improves focus
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on various choline supplements. They all have a different purpose but I really wanted something that would help me focus during the day while working. This seems to work. I fast during the day and I take this on an empty stomach with no problems. I think it's easier to feel the effects on an empty stomach. The feeling is hard to describe but you can definitely feel an increase in alertness and it helps me stay mentally productive longer. I haven't seen a huge difference in my memory yet but I haven't been paying close attention to that.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: You really need to try this
customer_reviews.text: At first I started thinking about taking a certain product that I had seen advertised on TV a lot, but when I looked into that certain product, I changed my mind. Then, I started reviewing other brands and kinds of products that claimed to benefit focus and mental energy, memory, etc. I ultimately decided to try CDP Choline by Double Wood (AND it's made in the USA!). I'm really glad I did. I take two tablets in the morning; I'm still working on my first bottle however I've already seem to notice a different in my level of alertness and ability to focus. I have purchased a second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Hyannisgal

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, this isn't the kind of thing where you can "feel it working," but I'm fairly certain I don't get enough of it in my diet, and it was part of the nutrient and hormone regimen that took me from feeling like a 95-year-old every morning to feeling great over the course of a year, so it stays.
customer_reviews.author: Shaeree

customer_reviews.title: I also felt more relaxed which was a nice added benefit
customer_reviews.text: I have mercury poisoning and recently learned that mercury depletes acetylcholine. I had trouble learning and remembering new information. After a couple of weeks, I could see a difference. I no longer need to take lots of notes on the job to perform my duties. I also felt more relaxed which was a nice added benefit. I will definitely keep using this product. Also, the company is very good in terms of quickly answering customer questions. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Works! Immediately!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with how fast I was able to feel a difference. I now take 2 in the morning, one in the afternoon. I feel slightly more alert and have much better articulation and sentence formation. I felt no side effects at all. I take it every day.
customer_reviews.author: monique18

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: As much as I order on Amazon and this is the first order that I have reviewed....because it's that good!! I was doubtful but hopeful and it has exceeded my expectations. I can't explain the level of clarity and sustained mental energy daily that I've experienced. I'm taking this for years of opioid use due to chronic pain. I take two in the morning and it truly lasts until lunch time. Even when I'm trying to browse online or not work, I feel like I have to because my mind is focused and **needs** to be productive. If that makes sense?! I am happy and will continue to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Brain boost!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product almost every day for about a month. I use it as a part of my nootropic stack, and it definitely gives me a big boost in focus, memory, and mental energy. The other things in my stack are Caffeine+L-theanine, Noopept, and sometimes I’ll throw in a racetam like phenlypiracetam. I generally have a lot of brain fog, mental fatigue, and bad memory. I’ve found that Double Wood’s CDP Coline along with the other supplements really help me out.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Crippling Headaches
customer_reviews.text: This product gave me tremendous headaches. If you're prone to headaches or migraines at all, stay far away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt975

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: After using choline citrate for over a year, I did some research and decided to try CDP choline. I have been taking this product for a little over a month. I noticed a big difference in my focus. I followed the advice of a reviewer here and started taking it first thing in the morning. So far, so good. I love the improve focus and mental sharpness. I will continue to order it!
customer_reviews.author: Safenprotected

customer_reviews.title: What the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: Literally, this is what my neurologist doctor asked me to take to improve my memory as I get older. Since I remember to take it every morning, I assume that it is working, but like many other supplements, you can never tell whether it actually has a beneficial effect or whether it is a placebo effect. At least if I knew which it was, I now would remember.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Boston

customer_reviews.title: So far so good for depression
customer_reviews.text: From this brand I’m taking: CDP choline, Alpha GPC choline and Uridine. 2-3 times together throughout the day. All in the hopes to help me get off Wellbutrin and Adderall. I’ve been taking this combo now for a week and it’s been helping a lot! I’ve had barely any depression and feeling like “normal” person again. Suggestion: I tried combining all of this with their Mucuna Pruiens also, but that made me feel like I was having psychosis. It was BAD. I thought I was going crazy. Scary.
customer_reviews.author: CardenasHome

customer_reviews.title: Reverse a Fatty Liver
customer_reviews.text: Dr Eric Berg from YouTube world recommends Choline as part of a Ketogenic and intermittent fasting lifestyle to balance blood glucose and reverse a fatty liver. I took this Choline supplement and in 5 months my A1C went from 10.9 to 7.1 and my liver function which had been off for years is now within normal limits.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth peterson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CHOLINE SOURCE
customer_reviews.text: I stack CDP with other nootropics on days I need the motivation this stuff is great for that. I have also used this product during night time doesn't disrupt sleep highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dram869

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended supplement with a range of benefits from a trusted source.
customer_reviews.text: I take supplements to support mental acuity, focus and positive energy. Choline is a more recent addition. It seems to support liver function as well. A major reason for my choice of Double Wood is purity, high quality, correct dosage and contain no additives, such as stearate. Just a note, I’m taking DW brand Rhodiola rosea and Bacopa monierri supps too, which are also excellent. A reasonably new, and trusted, supplier for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work, and quickly.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is now devoted to this product. She very quickly noted elimination of 'brain fog', and moved from a single capsule in the morning to a capsule after breakfast and after lunch. Now her sister is experiencing similar positive results. I think it was helping me, but I developed a bit of a rash and a constant blood-shot eye. Both conditions cleared up shortly after stopping the doses. Don't be alarmed by my experience...I am a bit of a delicate flower when it comes to supplements and medicines. This product is absolutely worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Don Beesley

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for CDP Choline
customer_reviews.text: Used to take Jarrow CDP Choline but decided to try this one. I can't tell the difference between the two honestly. I am prone to headaches from the rest of my stack if I don't supplement Choline, and I haven't had any taking this. My memory has definetly seen improvements overall, but I can't say any one part of my stack helped more than the other. Give this one a shot for your Choline needs.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Solid supplement for increased and sustained energy levels
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE:I last review this in July 2017. I am STILL in love with this product. Staple in my supplement line up. Thank you Double Wood for providing such high quality product! Everything the description says. I have benefitted from sustained and improved energy levels. For me, it cleared my morning "brain fog" wishing 30 minutes of taking it. Greatly Increased my focus and concentration on mundane tasks and creative endeavors. I did not experience negative side effects or your typical "crash". Very pleased. Will order again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: 20 years ago, I took a choline product when I was working on writing my thesis, and it helped, but also contained caffeine and sweetener (it was a powder). Although it did help me, I stopped using it after I finished my work because I didn’t want the other ingredients. Now (at 60 years old!) I am once again working on another important project and - after researching the available products - decided to order Double Wood Supplements CDP Choline. It has helped me to get through these final weeks of my work without any negative side effects. I’m grateful to have found it when I did!
customer_reviews.author: Arleen M Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should, especially within the ‘Uridine Stack’
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking CDP Choline (as a constituent of the ‘Uridine Stack’) for about two months now, and my most recently used bottle was that purchased from Double Wood Supplements. Although I’ve taken the product in addition to the other components of the ‘Uridine Stack’ and so cannot give a specific analysis of the product, I can verify that it has overall improved my mood, cognitive abilities, and memory retention - specifically in regards to mathematical reasoning and retention of numbers. I am continually shocked that I am able to retain project numbers several days after being exposed to them.
customer_reviews.author: Justin O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I've been taking it for more than 1.5yrs and I am more productive, focused, and mentally clear than I have ever been in my life. I love the mental energy I have after taking this product for this period of time and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what's in this
customer_reviews.text: These actually scared me. I had a cloudy head all day and was so paranoid and upset the entire day after taking one capsule. I didn't pay it any attention until day 2. I shrugged it off as a bad day since I had just cold "Turkied" my Adderall. Well that had never happened before, but day 2 was worse. I was in cold sweats. I took 1 capsule in the AM and 1 in the PM. After trying to figure out what was wrong with me for most of the day; restlessness, emotions ranging from confusion to paranoia, I decided it had to be the supplement. I haven't taken it since, and I feel fine.
customer_reviews.author: N Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Clarity focus energy...
customer_reviews.text: I came across this is I am trying to discontinue my ADHD RX. I believe I have experienced more clarity and energy. I would say to most assuredly give it a try. I experienced no side effects (like rx) just be sure you give it a few weeks taking consistently. The company double wood has great costumer service and will assist you if you have questions which is another bonus.
customer_reviews.author: ScarletFire

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: N of 1 here. I'm a software engineer at a fast-paced environment. I need to be able to learn lots of stuff quickly and maintain focus for long hours. My protocol of taking 1 Citicoline in the morning with fish oil and another post-lunch with fish oil has made a subjective but material improvement in my mental energy levels. For me, the effect of Citicoline isn't stimulating, but rather it staves off this feeling of being mentally spent and waterlogged in the brain after you do a mentally challenging task.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Wei

customer_reviews.title: Best supplement for focus.
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonders for focus and concentration. This supplement works wonderful for focus and brain function. I have noticed a difference within a day of taking. I have been taking this supplement for over 3 months now. My concentration for tasks have been superior. I take every day in the morning after coffee with glass of water. I am a very high functioning and self aware person. I appreciate the supplement allowing me to remain at full capacity with my brain power. Everyone needs a little help with focus these days with all that we have to do. Thanks for making a great, clean supplement for a high powered person like me. Amal Sliman (personal trainer & health advocate)
customer_reviews.author: Amal Sliman

customer_reviews.title: Fair price...and its made in the USA!
customer_reviews.text: I use this supplement (along with Uridine, CDP-Choline) to help me study for IT certifications .I can honestly say that individually it works but combine them together (with the others I have mentioned) and woah dramatic improvement!!! Double Wood Supplements offers this at a fair price...and most importantly it’s made in the USA!

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after reading some reviews in the scientific literature and books on brain health and dementia. I had no adverse reaction to this supplement which was pleasantly surprising since I have many allergies. More importantly, I do think that it helps mental alertness and clarity which I was hoping for but did not expect necessarily. This company also has a great reputation and can be trusted!
customer_reviews.author: Jestr

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to maintain wellbeing
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: this is now a part of my regular routine everyday. I feel it definitely helps with clarity and memory recall. I have been taking for a little over a month now, I believe it helps regulate my cognitive thinking.
customer_reviews.author: loyal amzn customer

customer_reviews.title: This one from Double Wood is the best price and is working
customer_reviews.text: Citicoline helps me. This one from Double Wood is the best price and is working. Citicoline has a low-risk profile and probably does help some. A Google search for publications about it and brain function shows there have been positive findings in the past. WJC
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Severe Headaches
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. I had taken CDP Choline from Life extension in the past, with no side effects, and good results. LE changed their product, so I decided to try these. From the first dose, I experienced nausea and severe, almost migraine headaches. I take other supplements as well, so after same effects on day two, time to find the problem. Day three, took only this new CDP Choline pill, same results. So now I am out over $20, and not feeling well. I do NOT advise taking this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lowe

customer_reviews.title: This worked wonders
customer_reviews.text: I had a baby 6 months ago and was having brain fog like crazy. I recently also had a dna test showing what polymorphisms I might have....It said I might be deficient in choline. So I started taking this supplement and it has helped me so much. I’m glad I tried it.

customer_reviews.title: Results?
customer_reviews.text: I have been at an age for a few years when memory begins to wane normally, I am told. I purchased this product in hopes of improvement in that department and I just purchased my second bottle because, imagined or not, there seems to be some improvement although there is room for much more in my case.
customer_reviews.author: Codger

customer_reviews.title: Good product. 2 capsules at a time has minimal ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. 2 capsules at a time has minimal effects at best. Therefore, it is less expensive to buy bulk powder form of CDP-Choline in order to take a higher dose or to stack nootropics.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged gel casings around 25% of capsules - wasted money
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunate lapse of Quality Control from what had been a reliable manufacturer in both quality and value. But when an entire bottle is tainted because of broken gel casings, and I realized this 2 days after the return window had closed, suddenly the "value equation" gets out of whack and may not be worth taking any further risks here.
customer_reviews.author: MarketWizard

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, sharpens my focus during learning, studying and exercising. Would buy again!! Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Works for clean energy and focus
customer_reviews.text: I really think this supplement is a beneficial nootropic for energy and focus. It's a subtle effect but I think subtle is best in the long run since powerful shit always has side effects and that which goes up must come down. I feel good about taking this.

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable Improvements in Focus and Cognitive Endurance
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Double Wood's CDP Choline and Alpha GPC for a few months and I have definitely noticed a significant improvement in my ability to focus for long periods of time - especially on days that I choose not to take my ADHD medication.

customer_reviews.title: ... 300mg twice a day and memory + energy much better.. Only side effect was initial insomnia that ...
customer_reviews.text: My 70 yo husband with Parkinson's Disease and memory problems post spinal surgery took 300mg twice a day and memory + energy much better.. Only side effect was initial insomnia that improved with dose reduction to 300mg in AM. Saved his functioning by 90%.

customer_reviews.title: Good for Mental Energy and Focus!
customer_reviews.text: I got a bottle of this after it was recommended by someone in one of my Lyme groups on facebook. It does, indeed, improve mental energy and focus. I'm very pleased with it and will continue using it, and have recommended it to several people who need help with mental issues.

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise I guess it is pretty good for focus and productivity

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised - I feel alert and focused
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product during pregnancy to help with memory and focus and I still use it. I believe this product works as advertised as I feel very focused when I use it. My one month old is extremely alert and inquisitive and while I cannot say it is due to using this product, I am sure it helped.

customer_reviews.text: I was sort of skeptical about this supplement but have to say that I’ve noticed some improvement in my focus and attention when using the product. I use this supplement before doing any tasks that require long periods of attention and focus, such as reading complex, or technical writing or doing extensive analytical writing myself. Definitely recommend you trying it out and seeing if it works for you.

customer_reviews.text: First off, excellent customer service from the folks at Double Wood Supplements. As far as communication and shipping is concerned they're top-notch. Speaking for the product itself, I've found that I am able to recall things much easier than before. It is a subtle effect but noticeable.

customer_reviews.title: Like others have said

customer_reviews.text: Made me really tired and spacy. Not blaming the product -- probably just something about this nootropic and my body that I don't understand. It's certainly not for everyone.

customer_reviews.title: quality source
customer_reviews.text: Choline is not a stimulant so its effects for me are that I just feel normal mental functioning when taken regularly. When I don't take it for awhile I feel mentally sluggish.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: interesting
customer_reviews.text: more cognitive based than the overall body sense i get from lecithin or bitartate. Just interesting. If I was only looking for mental performance in a choline product, this would be a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Legit and potent
customer_reviews.text: I can vouch for this product and will continue to order from this brand. I hope they keep it up and not change the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulla Al-shammari

customer_reviews.title: Effortless Recall and Focus
customer_reviews.text: I feel that this CDP Choline has given me the ability to recall information in a much more streamlined and effortless manner. Additionally, whenever I need to rapidly respond to a complex situation, my thought patterns just seem to flow effortlessly in the direction of a solution, without a lot of forced intention on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

customer_reviews.title: Good quality CDP
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to help reduce fat in my liver and also to help my brain fog. After taking it for about a week, I noticed my focus has gotten a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne L. Tudor

customer_reviews.title: Winner winner
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking both the CDP Choline and Rhodiola once a day for a little over a month and am enjoying a clearer head, improved focus during busy sprees at work, and dramatically improved mood. Hopefully it’s not a coincidence - I’m sure things will become more evident over the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Support for Brain Health
customer_reviews.text: The supplement was recommend by a naturopathic physician and after discussion of studies, I determined it was a valuable supplement to my daily nutrition. It has been less than 2 months and while there have been no significant changes, I still believe (based upon current information) it is a beneficial addition.
customer_reviews.author: Nukegirl

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big fan of double wood supplements. I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of double wood supplements. I've been taking this supplement in tandem with their uridine. At first I didn't notice a change in my abilities but over time I've seen that I'm more able while doing school work. I'm in school and work full time so I'll take all the help I can get.
customer_reviews.author: Tali

customer_reviews.title: Memory and recall have improved dramatically.
customer_reviews.text: Huge improvement in memory/recall. I no longer find myself searching for words during a conversation. I noticed a difference after a week and my recall continued to improve over time. I am also taking uridine and alpha-gpc from the same company. I have been taking these for about two months now. Wish I had learned of these supplements years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: A great component for the uridine "happy stack"
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a component of the happy stack which has been demonstrated to upregulate dopamine receptor density and it seems to work like a charm. I get good extended focus with minimal side effects and the price point is one of the better one's I've seen. I will continue to purchase product as it seems to work better for me than Alpha GPC when used in this stack.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: I have to say this stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this stuff is amazing! I gave up caffeine years ago and was looking for something to help with brain function and found this. I can absolutely tell a difference if I neglect to take this in the morning. I also take vit. D which helps balance mood. I would highly recommend taking this and this brand. I’ve tried another brand and didn’t feel it was effective. Been taking it for around a year and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Harris

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have great difficulty focusing every day. This really helps to slightly improve my focus!
customer_reviews.author: A Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: For improved memory CDP Choline really helps!
customer_reviews.text: Since I recently retired, my son ordered my first bottle of CDP Choline to help with what I felt was a decrease in my memory. I believe it has increased my focusing ability and thus, improves my memory. I notice when I haven't taken it in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great brain boost
customer_reviews.text: I am almost done with my first bottle of CDP Choline and I have really noticed a change in my concentration and focus at work. My nutritionist recommended me to take durring my pregnancy to help boost my babies brain development. I have already recommended to three of my coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: Moki_Vee

customer_reviews.title: My Sharp Memory and Focus is Back!!
customer_reviews.text: CDP Choline by Double Wood Supplements has been great! I noticed that within just a few days I felt more alert and was able to think more clearly and quickly! I feel more sharp and am remembering things better! As I near menopause, I was often forgetting what I was needing to do but now I am remembering! Overall, I just feel more focused and energetic!
customer_reviews.author: April Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I have the MTHFR gene so my functional medicine therapist would like me to take this
customer_reviews.text: I have taken one bottle so will continue @ hope for results. I have the MTHFR gene so my functional medicine therapist would like me to take this..
customer_reviews.author: harry gikling

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing for me
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I wasn’t patient enough but I felt like I was a little worse off after I started taking CDP choline. Probably just because everyone s going to have a different reaction. In my case it did nothing for me. I was actually experiencing more “brain farts” than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Unik

customer_reviews.title: Great cognitive support!
customer_reviews.text: This is really good stuff. I noted the ability to recall information was much improved. Greatly helped productivty.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: I've never tried choline before, but I started this ...
customer_reviews.text: I've never tried choline before, but I started this bottle and it really helps me with my occasional caffeine headache (but it's also important to drink a lot of water). I take this regularly before a study session. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Not as stressed since taking.
customer_reviews.text: I take this with uridine and fish oil. My stress level is improving. I’m hoping it will help my spouse who has dementia. I’m trying to ween off of antidepressant and I think this is helping.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product to anyone who has some minor memory ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using CDP Choline for some time now and I can’t live without it. I have noticed a difference in my mental sharpness and memory. I recommend this product to anyone who has some minor memory issues.
customer_reviews.author: Marla A. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Not for me...
customer_reviews.text: Took as prescribed for 2 weeks but didn't quite do it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Dani

customer_reviews.title: love!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality supplement. Along with increasing my omega-3 intake and trying to detox off caffeine, this really helps so much as far as focus/cognitive performance. Will definitely be continuing to order this brand of CDP-choline.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service. Arrived on time as expected. High quality product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I prefer GPC choline, but I take this as a substitute sometimes. Doesn’t work as fast. Better for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: CDP Choline (Citicoline) Supplement, Pharmaceutical Grade, Made in USA (60 Capsules 300mg)
product_meta.description: CDP Choline (Citicoline)is a nootropic supplement and is an intermediate in the generation of phosphatidylcholine from choline. Studies have shown supplementation with CDP Choline to improve focus, mental energy, and memory. Supplementation with CDP Choline may also increase dopamine receptor densities.
feature_bullets: INCREASE CHOLINE LEVELS - CDP Choline is an effective and potent Choline source.
ENHANCE MEMORY - Retain more of what you learn, and recall memories with greater ease.
BOOST COGNITIVE FUNCTION - Improves working memory, focus, and mental energy
MADE IN THE USA - Our CDP Choline is manufactured right here in the USA
